text: Lieutenant-Colonel Evelyn George Harcourt Powell (1883-1961) was a British Army officer, and Conservative MP for Southwark South East. He contested the seat in 1929, won it from Labour in 1931, but lost it back to them in 1935. Category:Conservative Party (UK) MPs for English constituencies Category:1883 births Category:1961 deaths Category:Grenadier Guards officers Category:British Army personnel of World War I
title: George Powell (British Army officer)
